channel.title: Music! Custom tho :P
channel.description: Hey, I'v come across an AMAZING Idea for our server! I was wondering if you could help me on the way of doing it, We've got skilling zones and we was thinking if you tele to somwhere for example Woodcutting it would put on the song "Welcome to the jungle!" Etc, Any idea how we can do this so it puts on the song at certain areas of the game? Feedback would be EPIC :) Thanks (Y)

item.title: Music! Custom tho :P
item.dc:creator: @bhill bhill
item.description:
@bhill wrote:

Hey, I’v come across an AMAZING Idea for our server! I was wondering if you could help me on the way of doing it, We’ve got skilling zones and we was thinking if you tele to somwhere for example Woodcutting it would put on the song “Welcome to the jungle!” Etc, Any idea how we can do this so it puts on the song at certain areas of the game? Feedback would be EPIC Thanks (Y)
